SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Parkershire Burger?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Parkershire Burger is arc {World Donuts}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Parkershire Burger?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Parkershire Burger is arc {Danielle's Chicken}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {World Donuts} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Christopher's Tacos} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Danielle's Chicken and Parkershire Burger is {45}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 176? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {185} from {World Donuts} to {Christopher's Tacos}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 36? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {29} from {Danielle's Chicken} to {Parkershire Burger}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 90 and 121? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {106} from {World Donuts} to {Parkershire Burger}, a flow of {105} from {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} to {World Donuts}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Cisnerosfurt Sandwich to World Donuts or from Danielle's Chicken to Cisnerosfurt Sandwich?
NC.A: The flow from {Danielle's Chicken} to {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Parkershire Burger to Danielle's Chicken, from Danielle's Chicken to Cisnerosfurt Sandwich, or from Christopher's Tacos to World Donuts?
NC.A: The flow from {Christopher's Tacos} to {World Donuts} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {World Donuts}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Christopher's Tacos} and {World Donuts}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc World Donuts, Arc Christopher's Tacos, Arc Cisnerosfurt Sandwich, Arc Danielle's Chicken, Arc Parkershire Burger}.
